name: Shots Fired!
description:
Shots Fired! is a funky rail-shooter in which you have to satisfy the needs of the approching plant. They want music, people or shots - or some of those things combined! Switch your current ammo with the number keys 1, 2 or 3. Then aim at the wanted planet and press Q, W or E to fire the object of your choice.

Survive your party police job from Friday to Sunday to win the game. You lose when you cannot keep up with the planets' needs. Keep an eye on your
saufo-meter!

Made during Franken Game Jam 2022 at Medienwissenschaft Bayreuth:

NicProgramming
VincentProgramming & Music
MaxSounds & Voice Acting
LukeGame Design
AnnieArt, Game DesignRoseArtLauraArt, Game Design
